alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 3:27PM CST until November 29 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 327 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bogue Chitto, or 8 miles north of Mccomb, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bogue Chitto around 335 PM CST. Enterprise around 345 PM CST. Ruth around 355 PM CST. East Lincoln around 400 PM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
